member.name: M:Eco.World.PersistentChunk.RemoveTransientBlocks(Eco.World.Blocks.Block[])
member.summary: Removes all transient blocks for array.

member.name: M:Eco.World.PersistentChunk.UpdateBlockCaches(Eco.World.Blocks.Block[])
member.summary: Updates following block caches: - maxYCache - max solid block Y for X,Z coordinate - topBlockCache - top non-empty block for X,Z coordinate - maxWaterHeight - max underwater block Y which is a top block for X,Z coordinate It assumed to be called only internally from method and also assumed to be called for chunks in same column from top chunk to bottom chunk. It ensures valid results and allows to make significant optimization by skipping X,Z coordinates for X,Z positions if chunk is below maxY.

member.name: M:Eco.World.PersistentChunk.Convert(Eco.Core.Serialization.Migrations.MigrationManager,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Converts chunk from old format to new chunk format using . It is required, because for optimization purposes chunk contains serialized blocks data, but when schema changes block ids may be changed as well.
member.param: Migration manager containing information about old and new schemas.
this flag used only for backward compatibility with 8.3, may be removed in 10.0.

member.name: M:Eco.World.PersistentChunk.UpdateHasTransientBlocks
member.summary: Recalculates if chunk has blocks, updates property and returns new value. If the chunk is frozen then just returns current value or false if undefined.

member.name: M:Eco.World.PersistentChunkGrid.ValidateCaches
member.summary: Validates all caches if they are not out of sync with blocks.

member.summary: Deletes the block at from the world at worldPos.
member.param: The world position of the block to be deleted.
Set to true to replace the block with Block.Empty. Ie. Crater should force delete the terrain. Handles removing blocks underwater.

member.name: M:Eco.World.World.ReCacheNoNotify(Eco.Shared.Math.Vector2i)
member.summary: Invalidates and recalculates world cache values at . Doesn't trigger any cache update events.

member.name: M:Eco.World.World.ReCacheWithNotify(Eco.Shared.Math.Vector2i)
member.summary: Invalidates and recalculates world cache values at . Triggers cache update events if cache value changes.

member.name: M:Eco.World.WorldChunkGridBuilder.BuildFromImportString(Eco.Shared.Math.Vector3i,System.String)
member.summary: Let you make building by description string which may be easily copy-pasted. Following commands supported: - room:dx:dy:dz:width:height:depth - makes a room with offset from current position (dx, dy, dz) and interior size (width, height, depth) - hplane:dx:dy:dz:width:depth - makes a side plane with offset from current position (dx, dy, dz) and provided width and depth - splane:dx:dy:dz:height:depth - makes a vertical plane with offset from current position (dx, dy, dz) and provided height and depth - fplane:dx:dy:dz:width:height - makes a horizontal plane with offset from current position (dx, dy, dz) and provided width and height - cube:dx:dy:dz:width:height:depth - makes a room cube offset from current position (dx, dy, dz) and size (width, height, depth) - b:dx:dy:dz - single block with offset from current position (dx, dy, dz) - bt:BlockType - set building block type Commands should be separated with ';'. Sample (room with door): bt:HewnLogCube;room:0:-1:0:3:4:3;bt:Empty;fplane:2:0:0:1:2 .
